snippet: The Palestinian president struck a conciliatory tone during a well-publicized meeting in the West Bank with about 300 students and youth leaders from Israel.
abstract: About 300 Israeli students and youth leaders travel to Ramallah, West Bank, to meet Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas for conversation about peace process; Abbas's insistence on peace between Israel and Palestinians is welcomed by audience.
lead_paragraph: The Palestinian president struck a conciliatory tone during a well-publicized meeting in the West Bank with about 300 students and youth leaders from Israel.

headline.main: Abbas, Talking to Israeli Students About Peace, Finds a Receptive Audience
headline.print_headline: Abbas, Talking to Israeli Students About Peace, Finds a Receptive Audience
